channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

@echo off set CLASSPATH= javac *.java pause
Try that

Mrx, that will not work.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

umm right click on your compiler “edit” then delete everything there and put this in there

@echo off
title Scaperay Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

then save…and it should work…if it doesnt then u need jdk 6

Read full topic
